name: 餐旅管理教育訓練與教學技巧研究
description:
Based on theoretical and practical perspectives, this class intends to guide us to profoundly think about: 1.) the essential nature of being a teacher/trainer in hospitality industries; 2.) the position/strategy of being a teacher/trainer in hospitality industries. And in the end, this class intends to facilitate us how to be a good educator and trainer in the future.
According to the above-mentioned purposes, this class consisted of several aspects: tools for teaching, teaching strategies, teaching tips, case method (Harvard Business School), and book review & discussion...etc.
Finally, in order to enhance the effectiveness of learning, during the classes, Learning-by-Doing will be the chief way to push you to transform what they have learned from the textbook to the real world context.
goals: 深化學生對於教學技巧之瞭解與應用
